Go to the city "City of Priest".
Drop 10 Elements of each monster in "Forrest of Elements"
Elements can be made out of "Imperfect element of ..", which are dropped by the same mobs in "Forrest of Elements" or in D5.
When you find 20 imperfects you can carry them to "Element collection official [Hwa Eun]" (19), which is in "City of Priest".

This conversion costs you 200k each try and it is not guaranteed that you will get an element. It can fail. The rest percentage of success was 35. But that was raised to a value that I do not know of.
Now you carry all those converted elements to the altars, which are found on all mayor spots at the "Forrest of Elements".
You have to find some more items, which are dropped by different mobs, or you can get them in "Picture of hell"
"Monster's Right Arm", dropped by "Demon Monster" in D4 on every floor
"Necklace of Evil", dropped by "Chief of the Traitor's Hangout, Yoong-Gi" at "Highlands of Sky" (Traitor Hang Out)
"Lord's Jaw", dropped by "Lord of Shadow Troop" in D2
"Sword of the Chief Defender", dropped by "Twisted Demon Defender" at "Emok Island"
Talk to "Priest Tower [Il Ja]" (14) [out of town].
Find "Souls of Undead" from higher level spirit monsters or MK monsters in D5.
Talk to "Priest Tower [Il Ja]" (14) [out of town].
The Trial of “I’Lryer” - The new world
Find 100 "Essence of undead", dropped by all mobs in D5.
Find "I'Lryer's ring" in D5, dropped by "Cheios" and "Dunamic" on F10 or "Illusion of Dunamic" and "Illusion of Cheois" on F9 (R1 and R2).
Talk to "Messenger of Devah [Jin-Heun]". Thru the left gates down the hill. Keep to the right side and go to the ramp. There is this NPC.
You get in your "Task" inventory "Moving trinket" and you can move to VOD with it.
Go to the city "City of Priest".
Talk to "[Eun-Seon] Master out of office" (10).
Click "[Receive training] Give me training" and select one of 3 skills (OTP, EVA or DEF).
Each lvl up, skill lvl increases (up to max skill lvl 20).
Rewards: Selected Mystery Skill (added to Common skills as Passive skill)

Steps: Go to "Narootuh" and talk to "DEAD Hye min" (between NPC 43 and Refining Deamon Gong).
Kill 200 "Twisted Deamon Officer of Attack" and Kill 200 "Twisted Imperial Deamon Commander" (Emok A9).
Find 20 "Mysterious Marble" and 5 "Piece of Shining Gold" (dropped by Shadow of D'evah).
Rewards: Access to 1st Awaken skills (click S and than Awaken tab)

Steps: Go to "Narootuh" and talk to "DEAD Hye min" (between NPC 43 and Refining Deamon Gong).
Find 2 "Gold Ingot" (you can create them with 200 Gold Coins [at Gold Master](50), which are dropped by Shadow of D'evah).
Find 60 "Mysterious Marble" and 15 "Piece of Shining Gold" (dropped by Shadow of D'evah).
Rewards: Access to 2nd Awaken skills (click S and than Awaken tab)

Steps: Go to "Narootuh" and talk to "DEAD Hye min" (between NPC 43 and Refining Deamon Gong).
Find "Procssing Awaken Lv3" (which is dropped by D'evah Boss).
Find 1 "Gold Ingot" (you can create it with 100 Gold Coins [at Gold Master](50), which are dropped by Shadow of D'evah).
Find 120 "Mysterious Marble" and 30 "Piece of Shining Gold" (dropped by Shadow of D'evah).
Rewards: Access to 3rd Awaken skills (click S and than Awaken tab)
